issue.title: trivago.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.10.1

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.trivago.com/en-US/odr/hotels-atlanta-georgia?search=200-14356

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

https://www.trivago.com/_next/static/chunks/web-vitals-tracker.57ba81e645d5ac6a.js

https://www.trivago.com/graphql?LogUserAction

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

performed_via_github_app.name: GitHub Actions

issue.title: gdt.gov.vn

labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

comment.body: The site blocks me after a few attempts, so I need to wait for cool down. If I remember correctly when testing the first time, DPI blocking was causing issue. I'll test again after a while.

issue.title: www.bing.com
issue.body:

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.bing.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bing.com%2F) ### Comment > On Firefox in Windows and OSX environments, and when Adguard for Windows or OSX is enabled, bing's homepage frequently fails to load background images and does not show recent search results. When searching through the address bar, search results containing images and videos are filtered and search results are not switched. Also, css-like elements are broken, such as oversized fonts. Username: `@soraneoumi` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/k5sx6jtecq8s4o8g0kk4cw8o8sow88oqh6uu8nqn2s.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ige90t89mds8g88swg8cgcg4c0gwk8cntv84ktdaxc.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/148psnfv4hdwkos08k0g4808sg8wkcwbdnvcxu11ls.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/rw03fnqzsn4408koscg080cgcgwkwwsgtpwqgsen40.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.20.2 (4988) System version: | Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.26100.0 Browser: | Firefox License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Language-specific:
AdGuard Japanese,
AdGuard Chinese Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | Fuck Examination
AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)
AdGuard Popup Blocker (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js) Userstyles: | disabled ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?adblocking.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=false&dns.custom_bootstrap=&dns.custom_fallback=&dns.custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.enabled=false&dns.fallback_mode=System&dns.filters=1&dns.servers=System&dns.timeout=0&extensions=Fuck%2520Examination%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520none%29%2CAdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fadguard-extra%2F1.0%2Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fpopup-blocker%2F2.5%2Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&extensions.enabled=true&filters=2.7.224&license_type=paid&product_type=Win&product_version=7.20.2+%284988%29&referrer=&scheme_version=2&stealth.enabled=false&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.26100.0&user_agent=Mozilla%2F5.0+%28Windows+NT+10.0%3B+Win64%3B+x64%3B+rv%3A136.0%29+Gecko%2F20100101+Firefox%2F136.0&utm_campaign=report&utm_medium=assistant&utm_source=win&win.wfp=true)
